name: Pick your poison (itch) (Dragnwiht3367)
description:
In this game, you are a prisoner trying to escape the labyrinth. 

On the way, you'll find poisons in chests which give you both benefits and drawbacks. Choose wisely to ensure your survival.

Note: Pressing parry gives you a small window where if the enemy attacks you, you counterattack for double damage. 

Controls:

Slash: O (you have a three slash combo)

Parry: P

Movement: WASD

Pause: Esc

Confirm in Menus: Enter/Click

Interact (with chests): I
